sections.heading: of an issuing public corporation, defined
sections.text: Subsidiary of an issuing public corporation shall mean any other corporation of which voting stock having a majority of the votes entitled to be cast is owned, directly or indirectly, by such issuing public corporation.SourceLaws 1988, LB 1110, ยง 16.

21-2446.Subsidiary of an issuing public corporation, defined.

Subsidiary of an issuing public corporation shall mean any other corporation of which voting stock having a majority of the votes entitled to be cast is owned, directly or indirectly, by such issuing public corporation.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 1110, ยง 16.
